data = np.genfromtxt(os.path.join(BASE_DIR, 'test_data/test_data.txt'))
ok_test_answer, ok_test_gridx, ok_test_gridy, cellsize, no_data = (kt.
    read_asc_grid(os.path.join(BASE_DIR, 'test_data/test1_answer.asc'),
    footer=2))
uk_test_answer, uk_test_gridx, uk_test_gridy, cellsize, no_data = (kt.
    read_asc_grid(os.path.join(BASE_DIR, 'test_data/test2_answer.asc'),
    footer=2))
return data, (ok_test_answer, ok_test_gridx, ok_test_gridy), (uk_test_answer,
    uk_test_gridx, uk_test_gridy)
